name: Chill Vibes
playlistDesc: Chill Vibes - perfect playlist to unwind and relax.
description: Chill Vibes is the perfect playlist to unwind and relax. Featuring soothing melodies, mellow beats, and calming rhythms, it creates a peaceful atmosphere for studying, meditating, or simply enjoying a quiet moment. Let each track take you on a tranquil journey away from stress and into serenity.

name: Hangover
playlistDesc: Hangover - Ease into the morning after with mellow beats.
description: Ease into the morning after with mellow beats, chilled vibes, and soothing vocals. Whether you’re nursing a headache or just riding the post-party calm, this playlist blends acoustic, lo-fi, and smooth rhythms to help you relax, recover, and reset—one track at a time.

name: Soft 10s
playlistDesc: Soft 10s - The 2010 English music scene blended pop.
description: The 2010 English music scene blended pop, rock, and dance influences, with artists like Katy Perry, Bruno Mars, and Rihanna topping charts. Catchy hooks, upbeat rhythms, and emotional ballads defined the year. Hits like “California Gurls” and “Just the Way You Are” dominated playlists, shaping the decade’s pop culture soundtrack.

songs.title: Let Me Down Slowly - Alec - Benjamin
Young And Beautiful - Lana Del Rey
